pr_title: Imply not(isInterface()) call for expensive matchers

timeline.message:
Imply not(isInterface()) call for expensive matchers

Also remove from simple named("some.name") matchers to avoid metadata lookup.

Imply not(isInterface()) call for expensive matchers

Also remove from simple named("some.name") matchers to avoid metadata lookup.

Imply not(isInterface()) call for expensive matchers

Also remove from simple named("some.name") matchers to avoid metadata lookup.

timeline.bodyText: Had to split this out as a separate method because some instrumentation uses hasInterface in method matchers to match method parameter and return types, so it can't exclude interfaces.
timeline.author: tylerbenson
